mapper.select: select id, user_id, paper_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.paper_history where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, paper_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.paper_history limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yikaodb.paper_history(user_id, paper_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values (#{userId}, #{paperId}, #{answer}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{obj1}, #{obj2})

insert into yikaodb.paper_history(user_id, paper_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.paperId}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})

insert into yikaodb.paper_history(user_id, paper_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.paperId}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , paper_id = values(paper_id) , answer = values(answer) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime) , obj1 = values(obj1) , obj2 = values(obj2)
mapper.update:
update yikaodb.paper_history
user_id = #{userId},
paper_id = #{paperId},
answer = #{answer},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
obj1 = #{obj1},
obj2 = #{obj2},
where id = #{id}
